messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Faith47 is from Cape Town in South Africa. She is an artist. She paints big pictures of people and animals. Her pictures have many colours. She likes to paint in different places.

You can see her work on streets. She also paints in empty factories. And she paints on old cars that nobody wants.

She likes that her street art does not stay forever. Soon, the weather will wash it away. Or people who work for the city will clean it. She thinks this is like life. Life is always changing. Old things end and new things start.
